variable.name: FAMID
variable.comment: PAEDS-n, for nth family from Department of Paediatrics, University of Cambridge, but mainly NULL if subject was recruited as a case only and not as part of a family

variable.name: MOTHER
variable.comment: A few as SUBJID if considered for this project, or JDRF/WT DIL subjectid if also recruited to a family study, or PAEDS-n.2 as placeholder for a known family, or 0 for missing

variable.name: FATHER
variable.comment: A few as SUBJID if considered for this project, or JDRF/WT DIL subjectid if also recruited to a family study, or PAEDS-n.2 as placeholder for a known family, or 0 for missing
